roleset.name: reorganize

example.name: transitive
example.text: If it isn't completed, Comprehensive Care said it-1 would be ``required *trace*-1 to promptly restructure its debt.''

example.name: ergative/middle
example.text: But if Columbia could keep its junk bonds separate from the thrift till they mature -- at full value, unless the issuer goes bust or restructures -- the junk portfolio might do all right.

example.name: with start and end states
example.text: NRM Energy Co. said it filed materials with the Securities and Exchange Commission calling for it to restructure into a corporation from a limited partnership.

example.name: nominal rel: restructuring
example.text: In this context , the State - owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission -LRB- SASAC -RRB- issued a regulation on the restructuring of state - owned enterprises .

roleset.note: RESTRUCTURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'restructure' based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'restructuring' found in BOLT-7. No VNcls. (from restructure.01-v)
RESTRUCTURING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from restructuring.01-n)
